EmailTemplate.subject: TPA Summit recap: Virtual primary care must-haves
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Virtual primary care core components A recent Business Group on Health report shows benefit consultants list virtual primary care as a top priority. During our recent Virtual Partner Summit our Senior Director of Virtual Primary Care, Bryce Miller, shared what employers—including the dozens of Fortune 1000 clients are using our Primary360 solution—want from this virtual primary care, including: • Integration with their existing ecosystems • Navigation to high-quality, cost-effective, in-network care • A whole-person approach including mental health and chronic care management About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
